minecraft:story/enter_the_nether.description: Build, light, and enter a Nether Portal

minecraft:story/cure_zombie_villager.description: Weaken and then cure a Zombie Villager

minecraft:nether/all_potions.name: A Furious Cocktail
minecraft:nether/all_potions.description: Have every potion effect applied at the same time

minecraft:nether/create_full_beacon.name: Beaconator
minecraft:nether/create_full_beacon.description: Bring a Beacon to full power

minecraft:nether/all_effects.name: How Did We Get Here?
minecraft:nether/all_effects.description: Have every effect applied at the same time

casa:nether/ancient_restoration.name: Ancient Restoration
casa:nether/ancient_restoration.description: Rebuild and reactivate a Ruined Portal

casa:nether/astrobrute.description: Send a Piglin Brute to the End and kill it before it zombifies

casa:nether/bring_down_the_beast.description: Bring down a Ghast with a sword

casa:nether/camp_of_the_damned.description: Travel to the Nether's origin and place down a Soul Campfire

casa:nether/cold_blooded.description: Kill a Blaze with a Snowball

casa:nether/devils_distance.description: Use the Nether to travel 666km in the Overworld

casa:nether/electrifying_alliance.description: Smite a ghast with lightning from the Overworld's heavens

casa:nether/hot_air_balloon.description: Craft a Harness, place it on a Happy Ghast, and ride it

casa:nether/inception.description: Break through the roof of the Nether

casa:end/dragon_vs_dragon.description: Kill the Ender Dragon while wearing a Dragon Head

casa:end/sky_high.name: Sky High
casa:end/sky_high.description: Fly up beyond the world height limit

casa:end/houston.name: Uh, Houston? We Have a Problem
casa:end/houston.description: Fly up to a ridiculous height

casa:end/the_beginning.name: The Beginning
casa:end/the_beginning.description: Kill the Wither in the End

minecraft:adventure/heart_transplanter.name: Heart Transplanter
minecraft:adventure/heart_transplanter.description: Place a Creaking Heart with the correct alignment between two Pale Oak Log blocks

minecraft:adventure/voluntary_exile.description: Kill a raid captain. Maybe consider staying away from villages for the time being...

minecraft:adventure/spyglass_at_parrot.description: Look at a Parrot through a Spyglass

minecraft:adventure/read_power_of_chisel.description: Read the power of a Chiseled Bookshelf using a Comparator

minecraft:adventure/trim_with_any_armor_.description: Craft a trimmed armor at a Smithing Table

minecraft:adventure/honey_block_slide.description: Jump into a Honey Block to break your fall

minecraft:adventure/fall_from_world_heig.description: Free fall from the top of the world (build limit) to the bottom of the world and survive

minecraft:adventure/salvage_sherd.description: Brush a Suspicious block to obtain a Pottery Sherd

minecraft:adventure/avoid_vibration.description: Sneak near a Sculk Sensor or Warden to prevent it from detecting you

minecraft:adventure/sleep_in_bed.description: Sleep in a Bed to change your respawn point

minecraft:adventure/hero_of_the_village.description: Successfully defend a village from a raid

minecraft:adventure/spyglass_at_ghast.name: Is It a Balloon?
minecraft:adventure/spyglass_at_ghast.description: Look at a Ghast through a Spyglass

minecraft:adventure/throw_trident.name: A Throwaway Joke
minecraft:adventure/throw_trident.description: Throw a Trident at something. Note: Throwing away your only weapon is not a good idea.

minecraft:adventure/kill_mob_near_sculk_.name: It Spreads
minecraft:adventure/kill_mob_near_sculk_.description: Kill a mob near a Sculk Catalyst

minecraft:adventure/kill_all_mobs.description: Kill one of every hostile monster

minecraft:adventure/totem_of_undying.description: Use a Totem of Undying to cheat death

minecraft:adventure/spear_many_mobs.description: Hit five mobs in the same Charge attack using the Spear

minecraft:adventure/summon_iron_golem.description: Summon an Iron Golem to help defend a village

minecraft:adventure/trade_at_world_heigh.name: Star Trader
minecraft:adventure/trade_at_world_heigh.description: Trade with a Villager at the build height limit

minecraft:adventure/trim_all_exclusive_a.description: Apply these smithing templates at least once: Spire, Snout, Rib, Ward, Silence, Vex, Tide, Wayfinder

minecraft:adventure/two_birds_one_arrow.description: Kill two Phantoms with a piercing Arrow

minecraft:adventure/whos_the_pillager_no.name: Who's the Pillager Now?
minecraft:adventure/whos_the_pillager_no.description: Give a Pillager a taste of their own medicine

minecraft:adventure/arbalistic.name: Arbalistic
minecraft:adventure/arbalistic.description: Kill five unique mobs with one crossbow shot

minecraft:adventure/craft_decorated_pot_.name: Careful Restoration
minecraft:adventure/craft_decorated_pot_.description: Make a Decorated Pot out of 4 Pottery Sherds

minecraft:adventure/play_jukebox_in_mead.name: Sound of Music
minecraft:adventure/play_jukebox_in_mead.description: Make the Meadows come alive with the sound of music from a Jukebox

minecraft:adventure/walk_on_powder_snow_.description: Walk on Powerder Snow... without sinking in it

minecraft:adventure/spyglass_at_dragon.name: Is It a Plane?
minecraft:adventure/spyglass_at_dragon.description: Look at the Ender Dragon through a Spyglass

minecraft:adventure/sniper_duel.name: Sniper Duel
minecraft:adventure/sniper_duel.description: Kill a Skeleton frmo at least 50 meters away

minecraft:adventure/bullseye.description: Hit the bullseye of a Target block from at least 30 meters away

minecraft:adventure/brush_armadillo.description: Get Armadillo Scutes from an Armadillo using a Brush

minecraft:adventure/minecraft_trials_edi.description: Step foot in a Trial Chamber

minecraft:adventure/crafters_crafting_cr.name: Crafters Crafting Crafters
minecraft:adventure/crafters_crafting_cr.description: Be near a Crafter when it crafts a Crafter

minecraft:adventure/lighten_up.name: Lighten Up
minecraft:adventure/lighten_up.description: Scrape a Copper Bulb with an Axe to make it brighter

minecraft:adventure/who_needs_rockets.name: Who Needs Rockets?
minecraft:adventure/who_needs_rockets.description: Use a Wind Charge to launch yourself upwards 8 blocks

minecraft:adventure/under_lock_and_key.description: Use a Trial Key on a Vault

minecraft:adventure/revaulting.description: Use an Ominous Trial Key on an Ominous Vault

minecraft:adventure/blowback.description: Kill a Breeze with a deflected Breeze-shot Wind Charge

minecraft:adventure/overoverkill.description: Deal 50 hearts of damage in a single hit using the Mace
